item.title: Cultural Appropriation-Suicide/homicide rates between races
item.description: It is unknown how much the difference in excess deaths due to homicide among black men and suicide among white men vary by US state. To compare the rates of firearm and non-firearm homicide and suicide in black and white non-Hispanic men by US state and examine their associations with state prevalence of gun ownership. In analysis part, I not only pointed out the circumstances but also bring out the resolutions in the concept of “cultural appropriation”.

item.title: GDP component and proportion comparison
item.description: GDP components over time and among countries At the risk of oversimplifying things, the main components of gross domestic product, GDP are personal consumption (C), business investment (I), government spending (G) and net exports (exports - imports).
